segments.advisor_message: So, uh, let's start with the basics. Can you tell me your name, please? Like, your first and last name?
segments.client_message: Yeah, it’s, uh, John Smith. But, um, some people just call me Johnny.

segments.advisor_message: Great, Johnny! And, um, do you have any middle names?
segments.client_message: Oh right, uh, I actually have one, it’s, um, James, so it’s Johnny James Smith.

segments.advisor_message: Thanks for that, Johnny James. Now, uh, can we talk about your date of birth? When is that?
segments.client_message: Sure, I was born on, uh, 15-03-1985. So, um, that makes me 38.
